topics.body:
So Christmas is in less than a week.
I need to figure out what I'm cooking.
It's either gonna be oven roasted brussel sprouts or a shepherd's pie.

I gotta go to my parent's place. Eat breakfast. Give presents. Then I gotta go to my step-dad's parents place. Hang out with them. Then I gotta go to my granddad's place and threaten him with physical violence if  he doesn't come to dinner.
